Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Superscript after the value. Change using msg.unit.

Change using msg.payload.

Value color, null->text color. Change using msg.color.

Color below low threshold. Change using msg.low_color.

Color above high threshold. Change using msg.high_color.

Threshold for low_color, null to disable. Change using msg.low_threshold.

Threshold for high_color, null to disable. Change using msg.high_threshold.

Match produces low_color for non-number value. Change using msg.low_regexp.

Match produces high_color for non-number value. Change using msg.high_regexp.

Display value in a chip/pill. Change using msg.chip.

Display unit with ISO prefix (K, M, G, m, ...). Change using msg.iso_prefix.

Number of significant digits to show. Change using msg.precision.

Zoom factor for value text. Change using msg.zoom.
